EmailTemplate.name: MATCHING Associate availability - Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Please reply to Availability for Interview - Remider
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Availability for Interview Please send us your response
Hello {!Step_Forward_Associate_Attendance__c.Associate_First_Name__c},
We sent you an email requesting your availability for Step Forward interviews 2 days ago. We don't appear to have received a response and you are not yet confirmed for this interview.
We are now actively seeking another candidate for this interview. Please call us on the phone number below if you still wish to be considered for interview.
Unfortunately, we may not be able to rearrange an interview if we have found a replacement.
All the best,
Step Forward Matching Team
020 3542 2404
stepforward.interview@the-challenge.org
(You can't reply to this email but you can send a new email to the address above)
www.stepforward.uk.com
The Challenge Network is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 39 York Rd, London SE1 7NQ
